rom:
-- setup:
"0001100000000000", -- 00: MOV R0, #0
"1111100100011100", -- 02: OUT [R0], #0x0F
        
-- while:
"0001100000000100", -- 04: MOV R0, #4
"1111000100000001", -- 06: IN R1, [R0]

"1011100100100100", -- 08: SHR R1, R1, #4
"0001101000000010", -- 10: MOV R2, #2
"1111000001000100", -- 12: OUT [R2], R1
"0000111111010000", -- 14: JMP #-12
